title: AWS EventBridge to AWS AppSync Events
description: Create an EventBridge rule to send events to AppSync Events.

introBox.headline: How it works
text: This project demonstrates how to use EventBridge to send events to an AppSync Events API.
An EventBridge rule catches events sent in your AWS account and sends them to an AppSync Events API.
A new EventBus is created with a rule to catch events in your account.
You can test this pattern easily using the EventBridge and Events API Console.
If there are errors delivering events to your Events API from EventBridge, they will be delivered to a DLQ where you can inspect what went wrong.
